descripcion: A young woman falls from a bar's upstairs terrace and a suicide note is found, but a pregnancy test and links to a political group suggest foul play.
Behzat runs into an old flame in a psych ward. A child's body found with both kidneys removed prompts suspicions of criminal organ trafficking.
When an ex-con who killed a woman in a robbery is murdered shortly after his release, Behzat suspects a former cop did it to avenge his wife's death.
The stabbing deaths of a fencing teacher and his elderly neighbor cast suspicion on an alleged gold digger, an estranged wife, her lover and others.
A financial adviser is killed in a parking garage getting in a car he bought for his son's birthday. Was the car's previous owner the intended target?
After receiving an insistent warning from a fan, a rising nightclub singer is strangled while sleeping over at friend Gönül's home.
When a young woman is found raped and murdered in her home, the police try to work out why the killer left out-of-circulation banknotes on her body.
When the police question a young woman who reported her identical twin sister's murder, they discover a world of difference between the two siblings.
A soccer star is found cuffed to a bed and killed by a blow to the chest, casting suspicion on his jealous girlfriend, his shady manager and others.
When a man accused of illegal magazine distribution dies in police custody, Behzat must lead a touchy investigation that could impact his colleagues.
Photos found on Facebook and in a home identify suspects in the murder of a college student found on a roadside, and reveal a personal link to Behzat.
Sitting on the rooftop terrace from which his daughter fell to her death, Behzat notices something that could possibly provide the answers he seeks.
Behzat finds himself in a race against time to save his brother from a revenge-seeking kidnapper who has a personal connection to a recent case.
Behzat's last conversation with his brother's kidnapper leads the detective on a hunt for evidence that will expose the undersecretary's wife.
When an ad agency owner is found murdered in her hotel room, suspects include her angry ex-husband and a model she fired over a fashion show mishap.
The fatal shooting of a professor studying the problems of Turkish minorities gives rise to speculation that his murder was politically motivated.
When Feride unexpectedly goes to the police to make a confession, Behzat and his men fear their part in the matter will be discovered.
A second killing during the investigation of a toy shop owner's murder leads Behzat's team to a decade-old case that links the two victims.
When Ercüment returns to Ankara to discuss his agreement with the undersecretary and a murder soon follows, Behzat sets out to prove he's the killer.
Feride gives her testimony in court. Behzat's continued pursuit of Ercüment takes him and his team from Ankara's streets to Istanbul's.
Behzat gets a rare chance to investigate a murder before it actually occurs, when a man dying from arsenic poisoning asks him to find out who did it.
After his late daughter's ex-boyfriend is released from prison, Behzat questions him and learns more about the last days of Berna's life.
A man who stalked the wife of a murdered gynecologist is ruled out as a suspect. So why are his prints found soon after at an unrelated murder scene?
Cocaine packets found on a man who was shot to death suggest a drug dispute, but further investigation reveals a cover-up of the true motive.
The death of a drummer who seemingly killed herself with a gas oven leads to her boyfriend's apparent suicide, but Behzat suspects both were murders.
Behzat and his team investigate the murder of a meatball vendor thrown from a bridge. Sule runs into problems while trying to tutor Behzat's nephew.
The homicide team takes on a rare nonmurder case when a kidnapper calls a local radio show, threatening to kill the announcer's 5-year-old daughter.
The investigation of a boxer who was found stabbed to death leads Behzat and his team into the dark underworld of illegal fighting matches.
In a trash heap, garbage collectors find the body of a young woman whose tattoos lead Behzat's team to investigate the possibility of a satanic cult.

A retired Colonel named Can Uçar is found dead in his house. It seemed that the colonel shot himself in a ceremonial suicide. But the Murder Squad believes that the colonel was murdered and the suicide faked. Chief Constable asks Behzat Ç to investigate. Behzat Ç. finds that Colonel was interviewed by a reporter and he tries to find her. One the girl is located he realises that Can Uçar's murder was just the tip of the iceberg. Behzat ç. gets critical information from reporter which puts his life in danger.
The body of a failed political candidate is found riddled with bullets. Was it his divisive politics that got him killed? Or his harassment of women?
When a life coach is strangled shortly after a seminar, footage of the event shows a mysterious briefcase that never left his side -- but is now gone.
During a vacation getaway, Behzat investigates the murder of a symposium speaker at the same resort and is shocked when he gets the ballistics report.
Suspects abound in the murder of a real estate developer, who was unhappily married four times and had recently fired his brother-in-law.
The murder of a mother and her two small kids leads Behzat's team to her husband, the relatives who disapproved of her marriage and a missing vagrant.
The homicide team investigates the murder of a airline hostess who had made many enemies at work before being killed. Behzat and Sulle sink into depression over Ecrument's return to the city.

Ecrument is deemed not worth protecting any longer, and Big Brother sends a squad of special police from Istanbul to Ankara to kill him. Selim is finally caught by Eda, and Harun forgives Cevat. Behzat tries to keep up.
The team tries to hide Eda and Selim's news from Harun on his big day. Behzat learns why Ercüment has been vengeful toward him, and who killed Berna.
After crashing into a car while drunk and yelling into a phone, a surgery technician is strangled at home. An unstable Behzat awaits trial in prison.
While examining the body of an unidentified man found in a lake, Ghost sees an embroidered monogram that triggers childhood memories.
In his mailbox, Cevdet finds a CD containing video of an unidentified man being tortured and killed in a fashion similar to a case from 15 years ago.
To investigate the drug links to the finger-chopping case, the police chief partners Behzat with the headstrong leader of the narcotics unit.
When a homeless woman is found stabbed to death on a neighborhood street, Behzat's team has difficulty uncovering her real name, let alone her killer.
An elderly Kurdish woman seeks help in finding out who killed her son, who went missing 30 years ago after being arrested at a protest in Ankara.
Hearing a gunshot over the phone, Behzat's team rushes to save one of their own. Facebook messages provide leads in a high school boy's murder.
Vulture finds a creepy item in his home. While investigating a murder in his old neighborhood, Harun runs into his former fiancee.
When a touring stage actor meets the same demise as the character he is playing, Hamlet, the homicide team is tasked with finding his murderer.
The team investigates the case of a transgender woman found dead on a roadside. Behzat comes home to find his ex-wife acting like they never divorced.
The investigation of an unemployed family man's murder reveals he owed a large debt to a dangerous person, whom Behzat recognizes from a past case.
A political cartoonist's murder gives rise to speculation that he was killed by a religious conservative group over an upcoming cartoon on evolution.
When a man is found dead in a remote shack, Behzat recognizes him as one of Ercüment's henchmen. Tekin's young daughter is kidnapped.
Behzat learns the recent murders of a boxer in a hotel room and a woman in a tub were inspired by a novel series, and a third killing is yet to come.
The case of a doctor killed in her home appears to be a theft gone wrong. But when a suspect turns up dead, it's clear something bigger is going on.
Behzat and his team anxiously wait to interrogate Tacettin once he regains consciousness. A veterinarian is found strangled with a dog collar.
Harun learns his sister is investigating Larissa. A worker's murder leads Behzat's team to spy on an appliance store, where shady activity is spotted.
Four pals steal a large amount of cash found on a driver who was knocked unconscious during a car crash. But their lucky find soon leads to murder.
After an elderly man is shot dead at close range while hunting, Behzat's team finds a witness: a senile pal who thinks he's still living in the 1950s.
An address found on a man shot dead in the street leads to a nightclub musician, who denies killing him despite a blood feud between their families.
Behzat finds a shocking link between an old friend and the murder of a company informant digging for insider information on a $60 million deal.
Two bumbling wedding musicians land in hot water when they agree to hide a groom with cold feet at their home, only to find him dead later that night.
Behzat's big day arrives. In an odd twist on an honor killing, a man is found stabbed to death, with a sex doll -- also stabbed -- laying nearby.
When a property developer who'd recently acquired land in the slums is shot dead, Behzat's team visits the angry residents who are being displaced.
While investigating the murder of a young worker at a car rental agency, the team learns the victim recently got int a fight at a bar with Savas.
The strangling of a well-liked doctor seems without motive, until the last person to talk to the victim -- a cured patient -- is caught telling a lie.
A cab driver reports seeing one of his regular clients getting stabbed and buried, but when the team arrives at the burial site, the body is missing.
A truck driver smuggling arms is pulled over by thieves posing as cops and killed, but the hijackers fail to cover all their tracks.
A body is discovered at the same site where the severed fingers were found. The homicide team continues to search for Ghost.
Ercüment returns to Ankara and targets Esra. Behzat searches for his mother's killer. Selim allows a detail to slip that makes Cevdet suspicious.
When Esra refuses to give up her investigation and is sent to jail on false charges, Behzat sets out to take down Ercüment. Aziz finds his quarry.
Behzat throws caution aside as he hunts for those linked to the murder of a loved one. Surveillance footage captures a face that may be the killer's.
After learning that Gökhan has a record, Behzat digs deeper to find out who pulled strings to place the ex-con as a courthouse security guard.
While working undercover at the bar with Eylül, Behzat unexpectedly crosses paths with Ercüment. Vulture gives his statement about the shooting.
On his way to meet with Behzat, Esra's ex-husband encounters foul play. Ercüment gives the former undersecretary's wife a test of loyalty.
When the body of a teen girl is found at a construction site, the team learns she and her little brother had disappeared from home during the night.
Behzat and his team investigate the murder of a man who abused street children, unaware that the killers are people they're working closely with.
Behzat has a disturbing reaction upon seeing a pregnant murder victim. Sevket views surveillance footage of his mother's last night in the hospital.
A nanny's odd reaction during an interrogation leads Behzat to the motive for the murder of a grandfather. Sevket learns the truth about his mother.
Behzat gathers his team members at Vulture's house for a long, cathartic night of drinking anisette, airing grievances and revealing secrets.
The murder of a retired counter-terrorism chief with a reputation for making false arrests reminds Behzat of his own part in an innocent man's death.
A student activist is fatally stabbed following a scuffle at a petition-signing event. Ghost makes progress in his investigation of Eylül.
En route to meet Ghost, who's phoned to say he has Eylül, Behzat revisits defining moments from his past and tries to make sense of his present life.
Before performing an autopsy on a murder victim found in a park, Barbaros is ordered by a mobster to hand over an item inside the body's stomach.
When an eminent physicist getting a passport at the police station is poisoned by injection, Behzat orders all exits blocked and hunts for the killer.
Homicide team members are shocked to learn the prime suspect in their new case is one of their relatives. Cevdet is forced to make a terrible choice.
The investigation of a 16-year-old girl's murder reveals the teenager was bullied at school and beaten at home. Eylül receives a lucrative offer.
The stolen diamonds put Barbaros and Muzaffer in danger. Eylül discovers the offer she accepted comes with rewards, but also complications.
While investigating the murder of a screenwriter, Behzat and his team are pulled behind the scenes of a television drama series.
When a private investigator is found strangled with a dog leash, Behzat learns he was trying to find a stolen dog that was to appear in a commercial.
After an attempt is made to kill Gökhan in prison, Harun and Eda are sent to Bolu to find his hiding family members, who are also in danger.
The trial for the assassination case finally begins and Gökhan takes the stand. Meanwhile, Barbaros and Muzaffer seek their own form of justice.
The body of a 22-year-old man who'd recently completed his military service is found in a dumpster. Ayse identifies the photographer she saw.
When a student dies of a cerebral hemorrhage after a university protest, the team must determine whether force used by security officers caused it.
Shortly after a young man's body is found with surgical-like incisions on his torso, a second victim with the same type of cuts is discovered.
Behzat discovers a cover-up behind the murder of a pizza delivery man, and accidentally interrupts Barbaros and Muzaffer as they are exacting revenge.
Certain Muzaffer didn't act alone, Behzat has Barbaros followed. Sule spies Emre in a shocking meeting. Gökhan reveals who arranged the assassination.
Barbaros and Muzaffer settle a final score. With solid proof in hand, Emre plans to make a capture. Those behind the assassination must pay.
Akbaba Bey returns to join the squad. Behzat wants to learn whether he met with Defne before.
Tahsin awakes. "Ragip" and "Ercu" force Behzat C. to make a decision. Meanwhile, Sevket's girlfriend is missing with all of his money, gold and his watch collection.
